en.title: Core summary
en.prompt: Your previous explanation was accurate and comprehensive, but hard to remember. Can you provide a rough, less precise, but still generally correct and easy-to-understand summary?
en.remark: Simplify and summarize complex AI responses by removing some of the overly detailed necessary information. Contributed by @hanson-reas.

metaDescription: Too complex? Get rough, easy-to-understand summaries. Simplify detailed explanations into generally correct overviews. Try it now.
